attributes.action: Guarantee all current County Council Elections be held on 1st May 2025
attributes.additional_details: It is undemocratic and against the will of the people.
attributes.background: To ensure all current and planned council elections proceed as expected on the 1st May 2025 and for devolution to be delayed until such elections have taken place

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 

Do not postpone the local elections - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
